overview: A romantic drama that revolves around childhood friends Eric, Gemma and Ponsie. Eric is the weak, fickle minded playboy, Gemma is the pretty tomboy, and Ponsie on the other hand is their gay friend. Vivian wants Eric as her boyfriend, and Gemma promises to make it happen. However, along the way, Eric and Gemma end up falling in love.
title: Wala Na Bang Pag-Ibig?
